title: Synthesis of novel piperazine-based bis(thiazole)(1,3,4-thiadiazole) hybrids as anti-cancer agents through caspase-dependent apoptosis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24992-25006
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05091F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Doaa M. Mohamed, Nabila A. Kheder, Marwa Sharaky, Mohamed S. Nafie, Kamal M. Dawood, Ashraf A. Abbas
Compound 9i as a novel piperazine-based bis(thiazoles) and bis(thiadiazole) derivative was synthesized and characterized as potent EGFR inhibitor with promising cytotoxicity against HCT-116 cells through apoptosis.
